special_text:
You may activate an additional loyalty ability of Bloodstained Armund during your turn if a creature died this turn.
[+1]: You may discard a card. If you do, each opponent discards a card and loses 1 life.
[0]: Bloodstained Armund deals 1 damage to any target.
[-7]: Target player mills half their library, then each opponent loses life equal to the number of creature cards in their graveyard.
